channel.title: Windows Vista™ or Windows XP™ or Linux™ or Mac™
channel.description:
What operating system do you guys think is better, i'm using Vista™ and like it the best!
~~Chad
P.S. I didn't add Windows 2000™ or 98 or 95 or any of the others and i do know there are more then one version of XP and Linux but go ahead bring them up if you think they are better!

item.title: Windows Vista™ or Windows XP™ or Linux™ or Mac™
item.dc:creator: @Schizzo Schizzo
item.description:
@Schizzo wrote:

I like XP, it’s been good to me thus far. I’m sure Linux is great. To hell with Mac, and Vista is too buggy atm, but it does look good.

Read full topic
item.source: Windows Vista™ or Windows XP™ or Linux™ or Mac™

item.title: Windows Vista™ or Windows XP™ or Linux™ or Mac™
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Vista sucks; too much hardware requirements for the limited features it can provide.
Even Bill Gates admits it.
The only good thing about Vista is the new theme, which is admittedly the best thing ever invented. But that’s only because if you don’t change the UI, people would think it’s the exact same thing as it was before. Like Calculator.

Oh also, it’s Windows® not Windows™, the little Window icon is ™.

Read full topic
item.source: Windows Vista™ or Windows XP™ or Linux™ or Mac™

item.title: Windows Vista™ or Windows XP™ or Linux™ or Mac™
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Windows XP is better than Windows Vista right now, because Vista as promised has more security holes than XP, and they are trying to fix many of them. Right when they released Vista, they had to release a security update within the week. I’ll wait till that OS becomes a little more stable in order to use it again.

But overall, Linux is the best. Just install vmware on Linux, and then install Windows XP on top of Linux using vmware, and bam you don’t need dual boot anymore. All you need is Linux!

Read full topic
item.source: Windows Vista™ or Windows XP™ or Linux™ or Mac™

item.title: Windows Vista™ or Windows XP™ or Linux™ or Mac™
item.dc:creator: @Krichevskoy Krichevskoy
item.description:
@Krichevskoy wrote:

shadow235:

I’m using Microsoft Windows XP, I’ve never seen what Windows Vista is like. Anyone got a clue?

It doesn’t run well on your computer. I guarantee it.
I’ve been alright with XP in spite of my initial hatred - but then, XP didn’t force me to buy a new computer just to support the weight of integrated DRM.

I use various live distros of Linux for specific things - network cracking, password ‘recovery’, running computers without working hard drives, etc. They’re excellent tools, but I have yet to find one that works for me in daily use.

I dislike Macs. Below a certain point, they’re for people who think that a computer would look lovely with the furniture. The nicer ones are for media junkies with money to burn.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:12, topic:92272”][quote author=Zoiked link=topic=134221.msg1295749#msg1295749 date=1178851943]
I like Windows XP for my everyday needs. Going to upgrade to Vista in about 3 months when the bugs are worked out and is working like XP.

Linux is just fun to mess with.
[/quote]

Try a year.

Linux (Ubuntu) or/and Windows. Windows for me at the moment, only because I’ve just started using Ubuntu.[/quote]same, but Xubuntu cause its way better. but i still use xp a lot.

I still vote Linux
